content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work at about 10:10 pm on june 8, 2013, noticed what at first looked like a very large orange big dipper consellation. being very curious, i stopped in the driveway and observed a group of objects traveling at a very slow speed from south toward north. as i watched, the dipper shape began to change and sevealr addition shapes started to appear to the south of the first grouping.  i watched it travel across the sky for about 40 minutes and it started to fade out.

i was able to capture a photo on my smartphone and have attached it.

a very strange feeling indeed.  love to have some idea of what it could have been.  i noticed on the internet several other people saw the same thing. get's on to wondering.  bill
content.summary: 9 to ten cigar shapped objects glowing orange, moving very, very slowly toward ne

content.detailedDescription: While reviewing recorded video of the previous few days i noticed this object "pop in" to a cloudless sky. it hovered near but not directly over a new microwave cell phone relay tower recently installed by verizon for 2-3 minutes while pulsating then faded out with 2 short flashes. video available.
content.summary: Recorded by residential security camera

content.detailedDescription:
Blue canyon around 11:30 pm 6/8/2013
cirrus high cloud deck, started seeing a pulsating object ~ 60 degrees above horizon at nw/w traveling orbital to around ~15 degrees above horizon at the end.
definition of pulsating light: as object was travelling from w to n it would disappear 2-3 seconds and then reappear for 2 seconds and pulsate.  example in this case would be when looking at a light house at nigh a directional pulsation is seen, same in this case. as object would reappear it would pulsate ~ estimated 2.5 sec. per revolution and the light direction would shine through the cirrus clouds for around 1.5 seconds.  when reappearing the path of the object would be the  exactly same but would not fit the interpolated path as one would follow it, it would drop around 5 degrees and disappear again after the directional pulse. 
i was with 3 other witnesses when this issue happened and no one explain the unusual pulsation and not following the interpolated path after reappearing for 2 seconds.
object
content.summary: Pulsating object

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i went to get her backpack out of the car. it was dark out. my daughter, who was 4 at the time, said, "mommy, what's that?" and pointed up. i looked up and saw a large triangular shaped object slowly moving towards us. it was low flying and completely silent. it flew over a football field that was right across the road and it was about 1/3 the size of it. it hovered just above the tree tops, right above us for about 2 minutes. we just stood there and watched it. we felt no fear, just curiosity. then it zipped over to the football field (the direction it came from), made a right angle turn and flew super fast northward and abruptly disappeared after it was maybe a block away. it had solid amber, red and greed lights at its points. it was completely silent the entire time and it left no jet trails or emissions that we could see or smell.
content.summary: It was triangular, silent, low flying, lit up at the 3 points and flew very fast.

content.detailedDescription: In my backyard at a family gathering. looking at stars noticed one come out of nowhere, and started moving across the valley, from sse to n. then all 8 of us started checking the sky with our equipment. not sure at first what it was, no blinking light, and objects hoovered, disappeared, and faded off into the distance. we were equipped with 20x70 binoculars, night vision scope, and thermo-imaging camera and a laser light. at first excited, some of us got the chills, espeically after on one we flashed the laser light at it and it flashed us back, with a bright light everyone noticed. we lost sight of the objects, one weaved back and forth and then dissappeared, some we just lost sight of in the distance, looked like they were headed upward. some just seemed to vanish, others seemed to fade out.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Using 20x70 binoc. nv scope. thermo vision camera. 8 witness's

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on an upper deck of at a friends house in worthington, oh when we observed two fiery orbs slowly moving thru the sky. at first we thought that the objects were planes, but we noticed that the objects appeared to be engulfed in flames and both had tails. it was too bright to be a star and didnt move through the sky quickly like a comet. the orbs moved very slowly. one of the orbs hovered for about two minutes and only began moving once the other orb got next to it. they ascended into the sky until they were no longer visible.
content.summary: Observed two fiery orbs with trails. one hovered for about 2mins. both ascended into thin air.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 9:30 pm after my daughter had got off work. i had to pick her up. we pulled into the driveway and i saw a bright star-like object in the sky. it was brilliant like a star. kind of like a real low flying satellite, no flashing lights. it was kind of like a candle flame. it moved not real slow but not fast at all either. it was a fluid and graceful movement. i have seen ufo's before and the movement is really different and not at all like our typical aircraft.

it descended over some trees and we lost it. we went to get in the car and drove towards where it had descended but to no avail. later that night i guess around 11:30 we rented a movie. we were sitting on the couch when out of the corner of my eye i saw a red beam that shone through our sky light. my daughter saw it the best and saw the beam through our skylight. she said it was two red beams. 

what is funny is at first we disregarded the beam. i said wasn't that a reflection off a cars break lights? my daughter said mom how could that be on the chair. i said your right. the window is far from our living room and i have never even noticed red lights before. we went on watching the movie and kind of blowing it off. since we saw the unusual object i thought it was really weird. i feel it is also weird that i didn't think so at first. it was an orange red bright beam.

this is my second sighting in this neighborhood. the other one i didn't report. i just don't want to sound crazy but i know what i saw. i had a witness this time. i am really worried that this could be a territory or something to extraterrestrials. there is a tree that faces my house and it has what is undoubtedly a alien grey face etched into it. everyone has noticed it. is this a coincidence, just a natural thing or was it put there? i have forgot to tell mufon about this for a long time. first one to notice was a neighborhood kid and that was a few years ago. just keep forgetting and then there it is. i tried getting a photo see if you can see it. it is what appears to be a large alien grey head with a face frowning.
content.summary: Starlike object and red laser beam.

content.detailedDescription: February 15, 2013. at home for lunch break from work, 12:15 -12:45 pm. leaving house at 12:45 pm when bright white object observed directly above house in stark contrast to light cloud coverage against deep blue sky. the white coloring against the darker blue sky is what initially caught my attention. thinking it is a ufo since no planes or birds were noticed and it seemed to be hovering, i retrieved nikon d3100 digital camera & began photographing object using af-s nikkor 18-55mm lens. observed object initially stationary, hovering before it moved slowly a noticeable short distance east before abrupt stop, turn in place, then continued moving short distance west before another abrupt stop. pink appendage noticed on top. boomerang shape depending on angle it presented itself through lens. as it stopped & changed direction, top surface or bottom surface observed almost molar tooth-shaped with it "wings" noticeable more rounded in shape. the object did not make sound. i saw no condensation trails near the object. it was necessary to return to work, so the photography ended. at that time i lost sight of object. i was excited to see what i was observing. i searched the internet later that evening to find any other pictures that resemble what i observed after viewing & enlarging images from camera. finally, a picture of similar object was located on another ufo sighting website. that object, similarly photographed during the day was observed over lake elsinore, ca, not far south from los angeles on october 27, 2012. i am submitting 1 photo but have more.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: February 15, 2013: county of los angeles, ca. day time sighting between 12:45 pm & 12:50 pm. boomerang/molar-tooth shaped white object with pick appendage on top.

content.detailedDescription: There were 4 of us enjoying the evening, the night was quiet, very dark and very clear (not a cloud in the sky).  you could see the stars up high in the sky when suddenly i spotted a red-orange light emerge from the east side of the horizon (behind the house tops).  that light began traveling west when suddenly i realized that this light was followed by another and another, and another.  it became a parade of lights in the sky that were almost evenly spaced, flying in arc form.  then there was a break in the parade and there were 3 lights in triangle formation.  one of them seemed to get ahead while the other two got very close to each other - which made me fear they might collide. we realized the lights continued behind those, some coming at longer intervals until eventually they stopped.  there had to be over 20 and i was able to video tape a bit of it with my phone. as i mentioned, the lights moved north west, heading out into the atmosphere (unlike a plane).  i lived in florida and witness a space shuttle take off so i can tell you that this was no airplane flight but more like something that headed out into space. there were no other objects, airplanes or anything else in the sky while these objects flew across; but oddly, once they stopped, we saw a plane coming for a landing and that's when we compared its appearance and the sound it made with the lights we had just seen, verifying once again that those objects were not any kind of aircraft. the truth is that it was an eerie sight because of their slow constant speed and the silence. i have some video footage that i can submit at a later date if needed.
content.summary: Quiet glowing red orange lights slowly flying across the sky some in a line, others in side by side.

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of friday, june 7th, 2013, i looked out my bedroom window and saw a large disturbance in the weeds on the small hill behind my house.  there appeared to be a somewhat round area, maybe 8 feet across, where the vegetation had turned very brown, almost scorched looking, and the plants were smashed down in one direction.  in front of the round area was another area with smashed plants and brown vegetation but it was in more of a straight line.  the way the plants were lying seemed to be mostly from right to left, facing the hill.  there were some dead leaves on other nearby plants that appeared otherwise unaffected.  the weeds of the same type that surrounded the area were also flattened down in one direction, but not brown.  the scorched looking area still has a few remaining live plants.  we have not sprayed any chemicals or any type of weed killer on the hill.  when i looked at my pictures i noticed the round, white spot above the round patch in one picture, which i didn't see while taking the picture.  my first thought was that it was a drop of water since it was raining at the time, but when i enlarged it, it seemed to be round and i thought maybe a raindrop would be tear-shaped, so i'm not sure what to make of it.  we didn't see or hear anything unusual during the night or early morning before i saw the brown patch.  we do have deer in the area, but they don't smash the weeds all in one direction or scorch the plants.  very puzzling.  probably just coincidentally, the same morning i discovered my garbage disposal and the vent fan over my stove weren't working.  the breaker had been tripped so i reset it and they still don't work.  my kitchen looks out on the hill in the back with the damage.
in november 2011, i witnessed a large, dark, low-flying boomerang shaped object gliding very quietly over my yard, which i reported.  i live right beside power lines.
 
i had to reduce the size of the pictures to email them, but they haven't been manipulated in any other way.  i still have the originals on my computer and my camera.  i would be happy to supply samples from the area if someone wants to investigate.
content.summary: Somewhat round patch of weeds with scorched appearance and weeds flattened in a uniform direction

content.detailedDescription:
Coming out of the movies with 4 friends, we saw 2 orange lights (objects) in the sky moving slowly towards us. at the same time i noticed a couple looking up into the sky. at first i assumed they were small cessna airplanes or maybe helicopters. as they came straight overhead, they disappeared. one of my friends said they are planes that are on the same flight path circling to land at pierre elliott trudeau (dorval) airport. then we noticed 2 more orange lights (objects) on the horizon and were coming on the exact same flight path. they did the exact same thing; appeared overhead and disappeared. i assumed they flew up into the clouds. my friend explained that the clouds in the sky made the lights of the plane appear orange. i don't agree with this explanation. then we saw 2 or 3 more on the horizon. they came on more or less the same path in the sky. i believe that one took a different path and then changed into a white light. as it got closer towards us, it appeared to be a white plastic bag floating down from the sky. now i am doubtful that the plastic bag was originally an orange light. i am not sure now. the people i was with were not as intrigued as me and didn't pay as much attention as i did. 

i watched to see if these orange lights or objects would come back around to land at the airport as my friend suggested, but i never saw them again.

my feeling was that these were not planes. i am not sure what to really think, but i really do not believe they were airplanes. 

i am hoping someone else reported this event.
content.summary: 6 or 7 orange lights one by one on a similar path ascend in the sky and then slowly fade or disappear

content.detailedDescription:
June 8th, 2013

my nephew and i went fishing on the in side of the ohio river on saturday june 8th.  we were sitting on the nth side of the river just east of a large power plant and factory on a dirt road running adjacent to the river.

at sometime around 9 pm i noticed a bright light above the ky side of the river.  jokingly, i said to my nephew that here comes a ufo and went back to fishing and didn't give the light another thought.  earlier a plane had flown over coming from that general direction and i assumed it was another plane coming from the owensboro area.  shortly afterward, my nephew said "what the hell is that", he was pointing at the light which was now pulsating rapidly and moving up then down but was hovering, then it moved from our se to the e over the river.  the object was maybe 1 mile away when it went over the river.   the object would hover and move up and down and the light would pulsate and get  very bright then dim until it just either faded out or moved directly away from us rapidly and disappeared. needless to say we were astounded by what we had just witnessed and kept our eye on the general area where we last say it.  maybe five or ten minutes later the object reappeared in the same general area that we first saw it and this time it was over the tree line closer to the river than earlier.  the object became very bright and intense and a beam of light came down and thru the trees.  it didn't appear to move at this time but just hover.  the object became so intensely bright that it cast a reflection on the river and you could plainly see the bright object and the beam in the reflection.  this lasted maybe 1-2 minutes then the beam stopped and the object began to move from the se toward the e.  as the object moved it became dimmer and either moved directly away from us or just faded out of view.  we stood there on the river bank amazed at what we saw and could not come up with a valid explanation of what we saw.  we saw what might have been the same object but much farther away again maybe 5 to 10 minutes later in the same area. i would estimate the total time from the first siting to the last as at least  20 minutes.  the were a few boats on the river both private and barges that we could see.  this was also much closer to the boonville boat club which is a large area of river camps and i would think that we were not the only ones to see this object.
content.summary: Pulsating light witnessed while fishing at ohio river

content.detailedDescription:
I observed 3 flying crafts. my attention was piqued when i realized they were too close to each other to be a normal flight path. i looked up and scrutinized better only to realize that one of the 3 aircrafts was a real airplane with mandatory green and red light and blinking white one. crafts are flying east to west. the other two flying crafts are on the north side of real airplane, no faa required lights, just dull big orange ones on what seems to be their bellies. i heard only the plane not the other flying objects. plane could have been on landing path to fll airport, or could have departed from mia airport. plane is about between 5k and 10k feet high, thus moving rather slowly across the sky which gives me time to observe the other 2. my position is about 20 miles west of fll airport. as i am following the aircrafts in the sky i am now looking westward since it is the directional trajectory, and soon loose sight as view is obstructed by neighborhood trees. i continue my walk and look up in the sky now eastwardly. 2 more of these unidentified crafts are following the first group, same apparent altitude, same size, same speed, same trajectory. suddenly, one of the two accelerated upward and at a much greater speed disappeared into space. the second vessel continued on its trajectory, following it seems the first group. i am very sorry that i was the only one on the street to observe this event, i would have definitely called upon others to look up in the sky and co witness.  please feel free to contact me to corroborate this written report. thank you for including this report with i what hope will be others. i want an explanation , if any is available. thank you again. veronique krup - 954 495 3858

ps: crafts did not land , cannot fill in section pertaining to landing soil vegetation
content.summary: Flying crafts following airplane, using same speed and direction

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at around 7:30 playing basketball by myself and i started to hear like vibrating and pulsating sounds i saw a big flash to the left of me i looked over and i could see a sphere flying in a snakelike fashion and then it stopped and hovered for about five minutes and then the pulsating got louder and it started to give me a headache so i turned to go and get someone and it just disappeared but it left behind a cloud with the same exact shape as what i saw
content.summary: It was like a sphere flying in snakelike pattern then hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Our group of friends were talking outside, when one person spotted a fast moving triangular group of lights in the sky (the shape was similar to stealth fighter planes). it came in from the nw and faded in the ne, it was completely silent and it was able to move across the sky within 10 seconds (it appeared to be travelling much faster than normally observed planes or satellites).

the 4-5 people who saw this were explaining what they had just seen to people who had not seen it, when one of the people pointed to the sky and said, "do you mean like that?". at that point 3 more people were able to see a second object which appeared to be the same type of object and nearly the exact same flight path.

the night was not cloudy and the lights on the object appeared to be dim compared to normal airplane lights. the object itself was not visible, but the lights look like one light on the front with 3 to 4 lights extending down each wing.
content.summary: Triange of lights moving quickly and silently in straight line. moved much faster than normally observerd planes and satellites. may have been a sleath plane.

content.detailedDescription: There were no triangles, no flying saucers, no red lights or cigar like objects...So there i was letting my dogs out last saturday (1st of june 2013,around 23.20) its daily routine before heading to bed, i was going to show my boyfriend the north star, it was all so static up there. i started to admire a bright star that stood out from the others when to my surprise i saw it just fade away. i was shocked but the last thing i thought of was 'ufo', it did get creepier when the 'star-like' sphere lit up in another area of the sky before slowly fading away once again. a perfect almost controlled dimming, as if someone was purposely dimming the light. it did this for a few more seconds, fading before moving somewhere else.It followed the same path but it took different directions. there were no clouds in the sky that night what so ever. at this point i called my boyfriend, still staring at the sky. his exact words were 'what the hell?', but like me he was skeptical, until the star like sphere descended a good bit and it increased to a tenth of its previous size and brightened up to a beautiful blue-white like color. believe me in those mere seconds i pondered every option of what it might be, a plane, a jet, space debris,shooting star? but it moved in a determined direction, with controlled dimming and had no sound(which is what really disturbed me)it also descended and ascended, hovered and changed in size. it was shocking and emotional and i am not one for going out seeking these experiences. it was in fact really beautiful. it hasn't left my mind in a week now, i've told a few relatives but nothing compares to seeing it i guess. i guess maybe it did affect me in an emotional level perhaps because my brain experienced something illogical. thanks for reading.
content.summary: Star like light shock as it moved faded into the night sky and appeared some where else , same path different direction brighter

content.detailedDescription:
I, and a couple of other witnesses, saw a lime green object- a lot like a shooting star, fall downward, but i knew instantly it wasnt a shooting star when it changed direction and shot itseft upward in the sky. it looked like a check mark...Well if you were to draw one; thats the path it took. and there were two or three quick stops  where it fell towards the horizon, then it froze for a split second, nearly blending with the stars around it, and then it continued to fall ... but made an immediate turn-around upward- something a comet or meteorite doesnt do. the experience trully gave me chills. i was with 3 other people at the time, they said the same thing. we saw the same color and we all saw the same flight path. we also saw another group of people 50 yards from us- down a trail from where we were and one woman said she saw the same thing.
i am totally open to accept it may very well have been a firefly, a shooting star or crazy glow toy people throw- but i know distance- i think most people can tell the difference between a floating firefly and a sharp, fast, distant darting light in the sky. im an artist and i have a good understanding of object placament and distance. it was my first ufo sighting- but who knows for sure.
content.summary: Bright green light falls, makes a drastic change in direction

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Today, june 8th 2013 around 4:30pm i heard a very loud noise while in my backyard. at first i could not identify the sound or where it was coming from.

 as it came closer i though it was a low plane or a helicopter about to crash. it is not uncommon to see planes from the airport (ne) or helicopters on the way to the hospital(s) here in london, ontario. 

 i looked up and it was a white triangular shaped aircraft flying under the clouds. i did not see any lights, nor any markings. it was coming from ne heading sw. it disappeared out of sight over our trees.

i did not think anything of it and figured it was a stealth from the air show in st thomas, ontario. i asked my boyfriend tonight if he heard it fly over today while he was out front of the house. he answered, no. which i thought was very odd because of how loud it was. 

then i looked up the st thomas air show, which is not till june 29/30 2013. i have searched the internet for something that looks like what i saw. the closes thing was the a-12 avenger ii experimental stealth bomber or the boeing 797.

 i can not say for certain what i saw but thought it was interesting and wanted to share.
content.summary: I heard a very loud noise. i though it was a low plane or a helicopter about to crash. white triangular shaped aircraft flying under the clouds in straight line. no light, nor any markings.

content.detailedDescription: Was almost to work...Driving into work and saw 7 bright red/orange orbs floating in a triangular pattern with the exception of 1....Tried taking pictures with my phone but couldn't get a good pic. they were hovering along the st. clair river almost onto canada's side. after driving into work which was less then a quarter mile from first sightingii brought one of my coworkers out to see them and by then they were gone. later at work i reviewed video of that time frame. i found one camera had caught the event. i got some good video and pics from that camera
content.summary: Saw 7 ufo forming a triangular pattern shape with the exception of 1 of them

content.detailedDescription: While outside tending my garden, i had the thought ,look up!  right where i looked up and to the north east i saw a morphing orb switching between blue white white pink white grey white colors. i felt time almost stop as i connected with the ufo. then affer the connection ceased i wanted a closer look. i decided to run in and get my binoculars. i took two steps and was almost told to stop and  look up and when i did the ufo was vanished. i grew up around an air force base and studied airplanes and got to see more then the normal kid gets to. i know of nothing like this.
content.shape: Diamond,   Egg,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: While gardening outside, i saw a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was washing down my driveway.It was just getting dark and something bright in the western sky cought my eye.It was about 1/4 of an inch in diameter.It was hard to know its real size because i did not know how far away it was.I observed it for approx. 60 sec.I thought it was an airplane at first.I have seen airplanes travel the distance it traveled and it took approx.60 sec..I  the object i saw traveled the same distance in a aplit second. it made several changes of direction 180 and 90 degree turns without slowing down.It looked like a big star. it was blinking blue,green and white.My neighbor was takeing grocerys out of the trunk of her car.And i drew her attention to what i was seeing.She saw what i was seeing too.Then it disapeared into some dark clouds.I used to be a skeptic about ufo's.But i know their is nothing of this earth that can do what that thing did.
content.summary: Bright light in western sky traveling at high speed.Makeing 180 and 90 degree changes in direction without slowing down

content.detailedDescription: I was on the phone, smoking a cigarette, on my balcony around 11:30pm on june 8th, 2013 talking to my boyfriend (who lives in ohio). i was talking to him about work and things (typical before bed) when i saw a bright orange and red pulsing object (which i initially concluded was a plane) fly upwards out of the south eastern sky. it was slightly the wrong direction as the local airport (romulus, mi about 40 miles south east) and came up from the horizon like plane ascending. i observed the object moving upward and pulsing colors (red and orange) and began taking images and video with my phone (while the headset was connected and in my ears so there is bleed over audio from the call) of the object. suddenly as it ascended another object appeared beneath it. then there were three total in a vertical line formation moving upwards. as the first two disappeared into the lower clouds two more appeared (5 total with only 3 visible at a time). the first three objects moved upward (northward) along the skyline and disappeared (very little clouds that high up, i could see stars behind them). i also noted an aircraft (commercial passenger) flying towards them over my apartment building heading south-eastern to the airport in a landing pattern. the pilot could have seen these lights as well as the airplane was facing them in its flight path towards romulus. the airplane was close enough i could distinguish its shape and lights (as is usual) and flew underneath of the objects as they ascended. the fourth object moved north east at a 45 degree heading away from where it began ascending over the trees (breaking the 90 degree rising formation of the first three objects) and disappeared into the clouds just above the treeline. the fifth object, glowing the brightest orange and slightly red, flew upwards and was completely directly over top of me. i could see stars behind it and very little clouds. when it was directly over the apartment building (as high up as an airplane in high altitude, not close enough for the craft to visible in detail) it disappeared into the upper atmosphere and was gone. i waited for more lights or objects to appear and did not see any. my neighbors were coming and going during the entire event but did not take note and got in their cars and drove away.
content.summary: Pulsating orange and reddish color (5 objects)

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette when i noticed something from an extreme altitude coming down to the earth. it had a tail on it. at first i thought it may be a meteor because the tail was wobbeling. the object was bright and as it got closer to the ground the tail got smaller and smaller. then the object stopped falling and hovered where i could barley see it over some trees. it looked red, orange. after watching it for about 7 minutes i decided to go inside.
content.summary: Fire ball with tail then hovered

content.detailedDescription:
I had just come back from a date, and was dropping my date off at her apartment.  i looked up at the sky, as i am wont to do from time to time, noticing how clear it was and how it was a perfect stargazing night.  a few moments later, as i was looking around at the stars, i noticed the lights.

the objects consisted of pairs of green and red point-like lights, like airplane navigation lights.  however they showed no movement like an airplane, showing only a creeping eastward drift barely perceptible over the span of approximately ten minutes.  my date said that she witnessed blue lights as well, but i personally do not recall seeing them, i only witnessed the red-and-green pairs of lights.

i first noticed them in the northern sky, approximately two closed fist-widths (held at arm's length) north of the bowl of the big dipper, approximately where the constellation draco should be.  there was a swarm of several dozen of them.  my first thought was that they were either a star cluster like the pleiades, or that they were helicopters hovering at extreme altitude.  however, the absolute lack of noise combined with the sheer number of them (i would estimate no fewer than 20, perhaps twice that many or more at its peak) made that seem implausible to me. the lights were blinking/pulsating, but in a manner more like the scintillating twinkling of a star rather than the periodic flash of an airplane navigation light or the steady point of light of a satellite (although the twinkling was much more pronounced than any star i have ever seen; when we first noticed them, the lights were clearly, visibly twinkling even though the area we were in (an apartment complex) was very light polluted.

the objects faded with time as they very slowly moved eastward.  this made me think that they could possibly just be satellites moving into the earth's shadow, a phenomenon i had seen before with individual satellites, but they drifted much, much more slowly than any satellite i have ever witnessed.  the movement was all but imperceptible except over several minutes (perhaps 7-15 minutes), whereas most satellites i have witnessed have had a readily perceptible motion against the background stars, bringing them from horizon to horizon within a few minutes.  these objects moved perhaps four fist-widths (held at arm's length) across the sky from the time we spotted them until they slowly faded away.  that, combined with the fact that i have no idea how a swarm of object in orbit could possibly move collectively in the manner i saw according to my (albeit amateur) understanding of orbital mechanics and my personal experience with satellite watching, left me at a loss to explain them.

the size of the swarm as a whole was very large, possibly being twice the size (or more) of an open hand held at arm's length.

my date and i were both eyewitnesses to this event.
content.summary: Green and red lights like on an aircraft, but there was a swarm of them with no sound, nor perceptible movement.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from dave and buster's with the kids it was around 10:00 pm and was looking at the sky and i saw this strange lights and they were very bright and they were at first in the formation of a kite(it seems like a kite to me), i ask my husband if he sees it and he said yes and it was just stars, then i ask my oldest child to look and she said that is no stars, stars are not that bright and that stars don't move, that's when i saw the formation changed its now more in a v shape and now they are in three's. there was maybe 12 or more i was trying to keep an eye on it and all of a sudden it was there then it just completely disappear, my husband keep insisting it was stars but there is no way that it was stars. i feel weird cause i don't know or cant explain what it was and i didn't want to frighten my youngest so i agreed it was a star but i know and my eldest know that it wasn't a star, i tried to talk to my husband about it and he didn't want to talk about it, he keeps insisting it was just stars. i would really appreciate if anyone know any explanation for this or saw it as well. thanks.
content.summary: Strange lights at fishinger rd columbus oh

content.detailedDescription:
At about 9:45pm, june 8, 2013, just left northern state pkwy entering 195 south headed to farmingdale ny when about 1/4 mile south 

i noted numerous, yellowish lights through the left hand portion of my windshield. after about 1 minute i decided to pull of to the 

side of the highway, and pulled to within 50 feet of another car which had apparently stopped to observe the same phenomenon. i 

rolled the driver's side window down to get a clearer view of the lights. i observed numerous lighted objects seemingly moving 

slowly, sort of in a loose formation, with some lights maneuvering away and then back to the group.Some lights seemed to combine 

and then break apart later. i also watched as some seemed to blink out of view. i also noted aircraft flying above these lights, 

so the items were below these aircraft. i also saw three distinct white lights moving south, slowly, and throughout the movement, 

all of the three white lights moved in what seemed like exact proportion to each other. later, as the lights began to fade or 

dissappera, i witnessed four white lights moving north, slowly, and again, those four lights seemed to be connected somehow, since 

they moved in perfect position to each other. none of the lights i observed blinked or flashed as would aircraft; the lights 

stayed on all the time. i had been using my car's navigation system, was low on gas, and considered turning the car off while 

watching the event. i glanced at the navigation screen and noted that i was 3.6 miles north of hempstead ave on 135. during the 5

-10 minutes of my observation i was able to grab my iphone and snapped a number of pictures of the lights. the yellowish color i 

referred to earlier is view able in the pictures. i am an aviation enthusiast, a licensed private pilot, and familiar with all types 

of aircraft. what i saw was not conventional aircraft, helicopters, or some type of lighted balloons or flares. i telephoned my 

wife to alert her to my delay, she called her son, and he and i had a brief conversation concerning what i was seeing. his query 

as to what it was i was witnessing is exactly what i am saying here. i don't know what it was i saw, but i do know they were not 

conventional aircraft. of the many lights i witnessed, they all eventually dissappeared within a minute of each other.
content.summary: Observed 10+ yellowish lights 9:45pm ny 135 southbound june 8. 2013 combining, blinking out, flew in unison then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: It glowed and looked to big very large as it was a couple of miles away.  it seemed to have a ring around it like saturn.  if a lighted blimp was in the area that would fit but i don't know if there were any.
content.summary: Driving home tonight my wife and i saw an glowing object in the sky, it seem to have a ring around it kinda like saturn.  it descended first then moved east we lost site as we were driving west.  it wasn't a plane or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:

youtu.Be/miegfzamjmc  

                              thank you,
                              michael masten
content.summary: I have just broken a sequencing code in the bible that offers full disclosure of crafts and e.T.S

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to walk dogs. it was 10:40 pm. i immediately observed a very bright nonpulsing red light moving at high altitude jet speed. i walked to a more open area of the yard and expected the light to be in a projected spot. it wasn't moving as expected. it was slowing down and came to a complete stop and immediately started to travel straight up. it was rotating as it ascended ( the light was on only one surface, so it was not visible while opposite me). the light was getting smaller in size and after three rotations disappeared. i am a retired air traffic controller and an active pilot. this did not appear as an aircraft would in the night sky. the sky was absolutely clear.
content.summary: Bright red light moving south from north, slowed, stopped, went straight up while rotating

content.detailedDescription:
planet venus was very bright that night in illinois i was in new york and it was raining so my girlfriend took a picture of it and sent it to me as i looked close at photo i saw what appears to be a large ship ufo i cropped the picture to get a better look and send it back to her but before she saw the cropped photo she saw it in the picture she took..
then she took more photos but it was gone.
no doubt in my mind it is a ufo .   peace. j.
content.summary: My girlfriend took a picture of venus and i saw what appears to be ufo
